pr_title: [Transform] maintain a list of unsupported aggregations in transforms

timeline.bodyText: I think "Have you added" or "Did you add" might sound a bit better here... We could also change it to something less accusative 😄 like "If this is a newly added aggregation, please open..."
timeline.author: imotov

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/x-pack/plugin/transform/src/test/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/transform/transforms/pivot/AggregationsTests.java b/x-pack/plugin/transform/src/test/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/transform/transforms/pivot/AggregationsTests.java
index 0fc01d6cdbf..580507d1187 100644
--- a/x-pack/plugin/transform/src/test/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/transform/transforms/pivot/AggregationsTests.java
+++ b/x-pack/plugin/transform/src/test/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/transform/transforms/pivot/AggregationsTests.java

@@ -93,8 +93,8 @@ public class AggregationsTests extends ESTestCase {
             assertTrue(
                 "The following aggregation is unknown to transform: ["
                     + aggregationName
-                    + "]. Did you added a new aggregation? "
-                    + "If so: Great, please open an issue to add transform support for it. Afterwards add \""
+                    + "]. If this is a newly added aggregation, "
+                    + "please open an issue to add transform support for it. Afterwards add \""
                     + aggregationName
                     + "\" to the list in "
                     + Aggregations.class.getName()

timeline.message: maintain a list of unsupported aggregations in transforms
